title: mention cmake3 for Trusty
body_html: I'm guessing in general you don't want to mention a bunch of special cases here, but Ubuntu 14.04 is probably the second or third most common platform overall and PyTorch doesn't seem to build with cmake 2 (or give a useful error message). I was only able to get a build to work on our 14.04 workstations after finding this in the Jenkins dockerfiles.
